Changelog
=========

0.3 - (2008-12-03)

 - Renamed package to ``repoze.bfg.htmlpage``.
   [malthe]
   
0.2 - (2008-11-13)

 - Added skin template API to acquire layout by name.
   [malthe]

0.1 - (2008-10-03)

 - Raise exceptions that are more meaningful.
   [malthe]

 - Renamed package to ``repoze.bfg.layouts``
   [seletz]
